text:
Margaret "Talli" Tallichet (March 13, 1914 – May 3, 1991) was an American actress. She was the wife of movie director William Wyler. Her best-known leading role was with Peter Lorre in the noir movie "Stranger on the Third Floor" (1940).
Tallichet died at her home in Los Angeles on May 3, 1991 from cancer, aged 77.
